name: Inner Mind (Lusófona Games: Arcade Room)
description:
Main Features

  • Imaginary Rooms: Rooms with different physics which allow you to walk on other surfaces.
  • Puzzle Solving: Solve puzzles by combining items and interacting with the world around you!
  • Visuals: Creative world building with a unique structure

Controls

WASD to move.

Tab for inventory.

Space to attach to other surfaces.

Esc to pause.

Further Information
Inner Mind was developed in the University Lusófona, second year (2021), Bachelor in Videogames by: 

• Pedro Marques

• Gabriel Santos

• Gonçalo Vila Verde
